## Code Quality Checklist

- [ ] **Code follows style guidelines** (Swift API Design Guidelines)
- [ ] **Self-reviewed my code**
- [ ] **Commented complex code** and non-obvious decisions
- [ ] **Documentation updated** (README, ARCHITECTURE, etc.)
- [ ] **No new warnings** introduced
- [ ] **No console logs** left in code
- [ ] **No TODO comments** without issue tracking
- [ ] **Error handling** implemented appropriately

## Testing Checklist

- [ ] **All tests pass** (`Cmd+U`)
- [ ] **New tests added** for new features
- [ ] **Test coverage** adequate (aim for 85%+)
- [ ] **Edge cases tested**
- [ ] **Error paths tested**

## Documentation Checklist

- [ ] **Code comments** added where needed
- [ ] **API documentation** updated (if public API changed)
- [ ] **README updated** (if user-facing changes)
- [ ] **CHANGELOG updated** (if release-worthy)
- [ ] **Migration guide** provided (if breaking change)

## Security Checklist

- [ ] **No sensitive data** in code or commits
- [ ] **Input validation** implemented
- [ ] **No security vulnerabilities** introduced
- [ ] **Dependencies updated** to secure versions
- [ ] **Followed SECURITY.md** guidelines

## Accessibility Checklist

**If this PR includes UI changes:**

- [ ] **VoiceOver** labels added
- [ ] **Color contrast** meets WCAG standards
- [ ] **Touch targets** are appropriate size (44x44 minimum)
- [ ] **Keyboard navigation** works
- [ ] **Reduce motion** respected
